#summary Instructions for using the matlab coded (in development)

= Introduction =

In Matlab:
{{{
clear java;
javaaddpath('/Users/btanner/Documents/Java-Projects/matlabCodec/dist/MatlabRLGlueCodec.jar')
javaaddpath('/Users/btanner/Documents/Java-Projects/rl-glue/RL-Glue/Java/RL-Glue.jar')
}}}

Or even easier:
{{{
clear java;javaaddpath('/Users/btanner/Documents/Java-Projects/matlabCodec/dist/MatlabRLGlueCodec.jar');javaaddpath('/Users/btanner/Documents/Java-Projects/rl-glue/RL-Glue/Java/RL-Glue.jar')
}}}


= Pitfalls =

An error like
{{{
??? Undefined variable "org" or class "org.rlcommunity.rlglue.ext.codecs.matlab.MatlabCodec".
}}}

Might mean that RL-Glue isn't in your Matlab Java Class path.
